text.text_translated:
Most people think poor countries are in a very bad situation.
People in these countries are very poor.
Bad leaders rule them.
People think there is little hope for good change.
But this is not true.
A big change is happening.
In the last 20 years, 700 million people got more money.
They are not poor now.
Also, six million fewer children die from sickness every year.
Many more girls go to school.
Many people now have clean water.
